sentences.en: Keats is referring to epic poetry when he mentions Homer's'proud demesne '.
sentences.cn: 当济慈提到荷马的'骄傲的领域'时,他指的是史诗.

sentences.en: Keats is referring to epic poetry when he mentions Homers proud demesne.
sentences.cn: 当济慈提到荷马的骄傲的领域时,他指的是史诗.

words.tran_cn: 私有地；领地；土地之所有

trans.tran_en: land, esp surrounding a house or manor, retained by the owner for his own use
